replies.author: wu77441
replies.txt_content: 高清武器类的有么

replies.author: Yie_BF
replies.txt_content:
huanyuejun 发表于 2015-12-28 20:39
怎样去掉加特林的速度减少？
//List here all the attachments allowed on this gun by shortName and separated by spaces
//AllowAttachments flanMWSilencer flanMWRedDot flanMWACOG flanMW4xScope
AllowBarrelAttachments false
AllowScopeAttachments false
AllowStockAttachments false
AllowGripAttachments false
NumGenericAttachmentSlots 1
//Modifiers
MoveSpeedModifier 0.4
PS：删除掉这一个选项 0.4是减速60%   1.4是加速40%
PS：删除掉这一个选项 0.4是减速60%   1.4是加速40%
PS：删除掉这一个选项 0.4是减速60%   1.4是加速40%
求给点人气！！！
KnockbackModifier 0
//Paintjob Settings
//Format is "Paintjob iconName textureName requiredDyeAmount requiredDyeColour" Multiple colours may be listed in order, seperated by a space
//Dye colours are "black", "red", "green", "brown", "blue", "purple", "cyan", "silver", "gray", "pink", "lime", "yellow", "lightBlue", "magenta", "orange", "white"
Paintjob Minigun_Candy Minigun_Candy red 4 white 4
Paintjob Minigun_Murica Minigun_Murica red 3 white 3 blue 3
Paintjob Minigun_Rainbow Minigun_Rainbow red 1 orange 1 yellow 1 green 1 blue 1 purple 1

replies.author: common
replies.txt_content:
2714491883MP 发表于 2016-1-25 16:34
最近在制作大型防具扩展包，求防具代码
这是从源码中找到的，半根单词据原意半翻源码大概翻译一下
DamageReduction  Defence  增加防御，具体多少因为对MC的API不熟系所以不敢确定
MoveSpeedModifier  Slowness  增加速度，具体多少因为对MC的API不熟系所以不敢确定
JumpModifier 增加跳跃，具体多少因为对MC的API不熟系所以不敢确定
KnockbackReduction   KnockbackModifier 增加击退抗性，具体多少因为对MC的API不熟系所以不敢确定
NightVision 是否夜视
NegateFallDamage 是否免除摔落伤害(确定是免除而不是减少，因为源码中是布尔型)
Overlay 这个不懂，单词原意是覆盖，具体什么作用我没试
SmokeProtection 是否不受枪械烟雾效果的影响(确定是免除而不是减少，因为源码中也是布尔型)
ArmourTexture   ArmorTexture 这个就是材质了
